Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Wait, you don't know <clr:0000>Hudson
Construction<clr:ffff>? So you weren't
sent here to help?
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>As the leader of the <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
workers out here, I've sworn to
keep my mouth shut!
You're not gettin' nothing outta me!
Greeting_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>So it's already night... <sp:5:0:0>Time sure goes
quick when you're working.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey, hang on. You need to quit standin'
around, and change into your YunoboCo
uniform—on the double.
Greeting_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Angry_01>Time to work, rain or shine. I'll work till
I can't work no more!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Ever try gettin' info outta a boulder? Well,
that boulder's ME.
Greeting_Thunder:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Angry_01>Time to work, lightning or shine. I'll work
till I can't work no more!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You again?


If you're dallyin' around here while we're
all workin',<sp:5:0:0> you prob'ly don't have much
to do,<sp:5:0:0> do ya?
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Wait, you don't know <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>? So you
weren't sent here to help?

If you head northwest from here, you'll hit
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, and <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> is—

<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hold it. As the leader of the YunoboCo
workers takin' on the task of clearing this
place for <clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>...
I've sworn to keep my mouth shut!
You're not gettin' nothin' outta me!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Wait, you don't know <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>? So you
weren't sent here to help?

If you head northwest from here, you'll hit
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, and <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> is—

<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hold it. As the leader of the YunoboCo
workers, I've sworn to keep my trap shut!

You're not gettin' nothin' outta me!
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Wait, you don't know <clr:0000>Hudson
Construction<clr:ffff>? So you weren't
sent here to help?
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>As the leader of the <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
workers out here, I've sworn to
keep my mouth shut!
You're not gettin' nothin' outta me.
Talk_0023:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>He's so tiny... Pretty sure I asked for them to send a
Goron to help...<clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01><sp:0:2:2:6400>Ah, whatever!<sp:5:1:0> The more worker's helpin',
the better.

<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>'s<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>workshop is
getting a lot of attention. Some call
it the "Zonai Treasure Trove"!
And there's still more stuff fallin' from the
sky. They'll be buried if we don't clear
it soon!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>We here at <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>don't know the
meanin' of rest, so it works out.
Talk_0024:
<clr:0000><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy><sp:0:2:2:6400>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>'s<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>workshop is

it the "Zonai Treasure Trove"!
And there's still more stuff fallin' from the
sky. They'll be buried if we don't clear
it soon!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>We here at <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>don't know the

Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You again?


If you're coming here in the pourin' down
rain,<sp:5:0:0> you prob'ly don't have much to do,
<sp:5:0:0>do ya?
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I'm sure I asked HQ to send a Goron to
come help...

Ah, whatever! Someone's helpin', and
that's all that matters for now.

Name's Sanson. I'm the leader of the
<clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>boys here that <clr:0000>Hudson
Construction <clr:ffff>tasked with cleanin' up!
<snd:TalkPositive_01>This place is gathering a lot of attention.
I heard it's being referred to as the
"Zonai Treasure Trove"!
And there's still more stuff fallin' from the
sky. It's not showing any signs of slowin'!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You again?


If you're coming here when there's about
to be lightning,<sp:5:0:0> you prob'ly don't have
much to do, <sp:5:0:0>do ya?

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>We here at <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>don't know the

Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>This place has so many <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>
and <clr:0000>valuable objects <clr:ffff>that it's called the
"Zonai Treasure Trove."
It's YunoboCo's job to gather the
precious parts.

Then Mr. Hudson and everyone on the
Zonai Survey Team work together to
develop various things. 
<snd:TalkPositive_00>A lot of which is top secret!<sp:5:1:0> The top-
secret stuff is<sp:5:1:0> TOP SECRET.

<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>I'm leadin' the YunoboCo workers here,
and I've got a reputation to keep. I've
sworn to keep my mouth shut!
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh. <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure I asked HQ to send a Goron
to come help...

Ah, whatever! <sp:5:0:0>The name's Sanson.


I'm the leader of the <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>boys
here that <clr:0000>Hudson Construction <clr:ffff>tasked
with clearing out this area.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>This place is gathering a lot of attention.
I heard it's being referred to as the
"Zonai Treasure Trove"!
And there's still more stuff fallin' from the
sky. <sp:5:0:0>It's not showing any signs of slowin'!
Talk_0004:

Greeting_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Time sure goes quick when

Talk_0005:

from <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>.

When are they gonna get here...
